QuestData.Title: Jaedenar Awaits
QuestData.Description: The cultists you saw guarding the claw were members of the Shadow Council, foul warlocks behind nearly every attempt to bring demons into Azeroth.$B$BNorth of here is Jaedenar, named in worship of Kil'Jaeden himself. Deep beneath it stretches Shadow Hold, a former barrow den and the Shadow Council's own stronghold on Azeroth.$B$BTake these herbs north to Wildheart Point, on the east side of the road. Greta Mosshoof will need them for her plan to purify Shadow Hold for good.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Arcanist's Herbs to Greta Mosshoof at Wildheart Point.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, just what I was expecting. With these herbs, our preparations for Jaedenar are nearly ready.
